1.content:
There are many things in this world yet to be seen, but one thing is for certain animals have coexisted in a way never seen before and not in the normal way of working together with whoever they exist with, but it seems as though having a round and fattened belly seems to be the way to go in this world. It is anywhere from a sign of wealth to even a normal fashion trend if the animal isn't fat then it's not healthy.




In this world, you can either be one of three things a human, an anthro, or a feral it is up to you to decide what you are






Now what are you?
1.title: The Beginning!

11.content: So you have chosen to be human! Well, then you have a few options!
11.title: Human

111.content: A male human well then will this human have a pet dog, cat, maybe a wild animal, or something else?
111.title: Male

1111.content:
Now, will he have a loyal canine companion?
Or maybe a feline that comes and goes maybe only to be seen during dinner?
Or maybe he will have another animal...
1111.title: Domestic

11111.content: What kind of dog are we talking about?
11111.title: Dog

1113.content: Multiple animals, or perhaps an animal at the zoo?
1113.title: Multiple/Other

12.content: Alright then you're an anthropomorphic animal now it's time to choose your gender.
12.title: Anthro

info.brief_description: Animals and humans all living together, but something seems off about the animals.
info.description:
There is a world out there that is full of Animals, humans and even animal-human hybrids that live together. There seems to be nothing out of the ordinary but something seems to be a bit bigger than normal; it seems to be the waistlines of all the animals!

in this interactive story, you can play as either a number of humans or animals!

Mostly anything is aloud but the main focus of the story is for the animals of the world to get fat by pretty much any means

Sex between humans and animals are allowed.
Weight gain is allowed.
Inflation is allowed.
Popping is allowed.
